title: Halloween Twitter War Pits Conan O'Brien Against Madeleine Albright
teaser: Comedian Conan O'Brien tweeted that for Halloween he'd dress as "Slutty Madeleine Albright." The diplomat replied: "I'm considering going as hunky Conan O'Brien â€” but that might be too far fetched."
